ibis.ipl.util.rpc

Class RPC

  • java.lang.Object
    • ibis.ipl.util.rpc.RPC

  • public class RPC
extends java.lang.Object
    Small, Simple Remote Procedure Call (RPC) implementation which uses the IPL for communication.

    • Field Summary

      Port type used for sending a reply back.
      static ibis.ipl.PortType rpcRequestPortType
      Port type used for sending a request to the server.

    • Field Detail

      • rpcRequestPortType

        public static final ibis.ipl.PortType rpcRequestPortType
        Port type used for sending a request to the server. Must be added to port type of Ibis used for RPC

      • rpcReplyPortType

        public static final ibis.ipl.PortType rpcReplyPortType
        Port type used for sending a reply back. Must be added to port type of Ibis used for RPC

      • rpcPortTypes

        public static final ibis.ipl.PortType[] rpcPortTypes
        Port type used in RPC. Must be added to port type of Ibis used for RPC

    • Method Detail

      • exportObject

        public static <InterfaceType> RemoteObject<InterfaceType> exportObject(java.lang.Class<InterfaceType> interfaceClass,
                                                                       InterfaceType theObject,
                                                                       java.lang.String name,
                                                                       ibis.ipl.Ibis ibis)
                                                                throws java.io.IOException,
                                                                       RemoteException
        Exports an object, making it remotely accessible. Creates an IPL ReceivePort to receive messages/calls for the object.
        Type Parameters:
        InterfaceType - Type of Interface which defines all the remotely accessible functions.
        Parameters:
        interfaceClass - Interface which defines all the remotely accessible functions. All functions in this interface must declare to throw a RemoteException.
        theObject - the object to be remotely accessible. Must implement the interface given
        name - the name of the remote object. Used as the name of the receiveport. null for anonymous.
        ibis - the ibis used to create the receive port.
        Returns:
        the RemoteObject
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if creating the receive port failed
        RemoteException - if the given interface does not meet the requirements.

      • createProxy

        public static <InterfaceType> InterfaceType createProxy(java.lang.Class<InterfaceType> interfaceClass,
                                                        ibis.ipl.ReceivePortIdentifier address,
                                                        ibis.ipl.Ibis ibis)
        Creates a proxy to the remote object specified. Hides all communication, presenting the user with the given interface. All calls to methods in the interface will be forwarded to the remote object. In case of a communication error, a RemoteException will be thrown.
        Type Parameters:
        InterfaceType - Type of Interface which defines all the remotely accessible functions.
        Parameters:
        interfaceClass - Interface which defines all the remotely accessible functions. All functions in this interface must declare to throw a RemoteException.
        address - Address of the remote object
        ibis - the ibis used to connect to the remote object
        Returns:
        a proxy to the remote object.

      • createProxy

        public static <InterfaceType> InterfaceType createProxy(java.lang.Class<InterfaceType> interfaceClass,
                                                        ibis.ipl.IbisIdentifier address,
                                                        java.lang.String name,
                                                        ibis.ipl.Ibis ibis)
        Creates a proxy to the remote object specified. Hides all communication, presenting the user with the given interface. All calls to methods in the interface will be forwarded to the remote object. In case of a communication error, a RemoteException will be thrown.
        Type Parameters:
        InterfaceType - Type of Interface which defines all the remotely accessible functions.
        Parameters:
        interfaceClass - Interface which defines all the remotely accessible functions. All functions in this interface must declare to throw a RemoteException.
        address - Address of the Ibis of the remote object
        name - Name of the (receiveport of the) remote object.
        ibis - the ibis used to connect to the remote object
        Returns:
        a proxy to the remote object.
